youtube.title: How Muscles Grow: The Science of Muscle Hypertrophy Explained
youtube.description: Discover the biological process of muscle growth! This video breaks down how lifting weights creates micro-tears, how white blood cells and satellite cells repair them, and the vital role of protein in building a stronger physique. Perfect for students and fitness enthusiasts alike!
